azurerm_mariadb_database.description: Manages a MariaDB Database within a MariaDB Server.

name.description: Specifies the name of the MariaDB Database, which needs [to be a valid MariaDB identifier](https://mariadb.com/kb/en/library/identifier-names/). Changing this forces a

server_name.description: Specifies the name of the MariaDB Server. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the MariaDB Server exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

charset.description: Specifies the Charset for the MariaDB Database, which needs [to be a valid MariaDB Charset](https://mariadb.com/kb/en/library/setting-character-sets-and-collations). Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

collation.description: Specifies the Collation for the MariaDB Database, which needs [to be a valid MariaDB Collation](https://mariadb.com/kb/en/library/setting-character-sets-and-collations). Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

id.description: The ID of the MariaDB Database.

create.description: Used when creating the MariaDB Database.

update.description: Used when updating the MariaDB Database.

read.description: Used when retrieving the MariaDB Database.

delete.description: Used when deleting the MariaDB Database.
